name: Manhattan
about: The Manhattan was the first cocktail to use vermouth as a modifier. Legend has it that the drink was invented at the Manhattan Club in New York City in the early 1870s for a banquet hosted by Winston Churchill's mother.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice
Stir for 30 seconds until well chilled
Strain into a chilled coupe glass
notes: For the best results, use a high-quality sweet vermouth and a bourbon or rye with a proof of at least 100.
